description: Immediately after arriving at the house, SF Power Co. employee Chris Ward finds himself a willing playmate with furry gardener Mark Evrett. They retire into the kitchen, where in no time Evrett is propped up on the table and Ward begins teasing his hole--first with his Prince Albert piercing, then with his tongue. Once the teasing is over, Ward begins the real pounding, first by fucking Evrett for a brief spell, then by inserting a butt plug attached to the end of a power drill! The tables are then briefly turned when Evrett fucks Ward while bent over the oven, followed by more power drill dong play. Once Evrett is back on the table, Ward gets his hand properly lubed up and slides it up inside Evrett's furry cavity. He starts off nice and slow, then begins to power-fuck Evrett, pushing his gloved fist in and out until the gardener's hole is a loosened up mass of deep red tissue pushing back out at Ward--who gladly moves in to taste it with his tongue.
title: Powerfist, Scene #02
